overview: Exotic dance is a fantastic way of toning your body and discovering your own self-expression and confidence, all whilst moving your booty to a fun routine!  Featured on this DVD are four classic sexy dance routines as well as a dancer's warm up and cool down presented by the internationally renowned showgirl Jamilla Deville. In an easy to follow format, Jamilla leads you step-by-step through each 8-count section so you can progress at your own pace.  If you've ever wanted to learn floor moves, lap dancing, chair dancing, or a showgirl routine with one of the world's best, now is the time! No dance experience is necessary, just a spring in your step and a cheeky glint in your eye!
tagline: Learn the art of seductive dance with one of the world's best showgirls
title: Tease: Daring Dance Routines
